Entry.JapaneseText: スージーのお父さん…… 大変な事になっちゃったね……
Entry.EnglishText: Susie's dad...sure got himself into something...

Entry.JapaneseText: 親父さんを軍に拘束されちゃって、 スージーも気の毒だよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Susie's father got arrested by the military. Can't help but feel sorry for her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 中身がクレアさんだったとは言え、 陛下を処刑しようとしたわけだからな。
Entry.EnglishText: That's because even though it was actually Claire, he <Italic>did</Italic> try to execute Her Majesty.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに、あのおっさんの考え方には、 悪いところもたくさんある……
Entry.EnglishText: There's certainly a lot wrong with that guy's thought process...

Entry.JapaneseText: でもよ、もとはと言えば、アガーテが悪いんだろ？ なんかよ……なんか、納得いかねえよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Although, wasn't this all originally Agarte's fault? Or something... I don't really get it...
